https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Belli is a 2014 Kannada film directed by Mussanje Mahesh and produced by Rajesh H R. The film stars Shivaraj Kumar, Kriti Kharbanda, Vinod Prabhakar and Deepak in lead roles. Music was composed by V Sridhar. Belli
